scene.name: GoldSaucerCaitSith
scene.p: Cloud and the others take the Ropeway from North Corel up to Gold Saucer.

Chocobo Mascot
Welcome to the Gold Saucer.
If Cloud attempts to enter without paying, he's stopped by the admissions lady.

Admissions Lady
Please buy your ticket here.

Admissions Lady
Welcome to the Gold Saucer.
Are you together? A single pass is 3000 gil, or you can purchase a lifetime pass for 30000 gil.

Cloud
- Pay 3000 gil
- Pay 30000 gil
- Don't pay

Admissions Lady
Thank you very much.
If you leave Gold Saucer, your tickets become invalid.

Admissions Lady
Thank you very much.
If you have a Gold Ticket, you can come and go freely into the park... as long as you don't lose it.

Admissions Lady
Here at the Gold Saucer, there are many places where you must pay with GP.
Just think of 'GP' as money that you can only use at the Gold Saucer.
GP can only be redeemed at the games in Wonder Square and at the Chocobo Races.
Your GP limit is 10000, so please be careful.
Please enjoy yourselves.
Moving on through the entrance, they find themselves in the central hub of Gold Saucer, called the Station.

Aerith
Wow! Let's have fun!
I know this isn't the right time to do this.
Hey, Barret, cheer up!

Barret
......I ain't in no cheery mood. So jes' leave me alone.

Aerith
Really? That's too bad.
She runs over to Cloud and grabs his arm.
Let's go!

Tifa
....whisper... whisper... (Wasn't that a little harsh, Aerith!?)

Aerith
...whisper... whisper... (Just act normal when this happens)

Tifa
...whisper... (You think so...?)

Aerith
Of course!
She runs back over to Barret.
We're gonna go play...

Barret
So PLAY! ...messin' round #@^%$!
Don't forget we're after Sephiroth!
He runs over and jumps down the tube leading to Wonder Square.

Aerith
...I think he's mad.

Tifa
He'll be fine. He seems to be doing a little better now.

Aerith
I wish we could just forget everything and have fun!

Tifa
We'd better be careful, Sephiroth might be around.

Red XIII
......You want to go with me?

Yuffie
With me!?
If Cloud tries to leave the Station alone, one of them will run up to him...

blockquote.p:
Aerith
Cloud!
Don't go alone, go with me!

Tifa
Cloud!
I'll go with you.

Red XIII
Cloud!
Don't go by yourself...

Yuffie
Cloud!
Let's go together, Cloud!

scene.p:
Info Board inside the Station
Welcome to Gold Saucer!
Many attractions await you here at Gold Saucer.
You will be moved and excited, thrilled and terrified! Led from one zone to another...
unlike anything you've ever experienced! Make your memories... today.
Shinra
"Now in: Gold Gate" Let's access all of the Attractions!
"Event Square" An entertaining show is awaiting you.
"Chocobo Square" Chocobo Racing takes you into the world of Virtual Reality! Wark! Wark!
"Ghost Square" Please come and stay at the hotel..... Ha ha ha...
"Battle Square" Go to the limits in heated battles! Try your hand at the special Gold Attack!!
"Round Square" Take a tour of the Park and see the beautiful night scenery of Gold Saucer...
"Speed Square" A Shooting Roller Coaster is waiting to take you into the world of excitement.
"Wonder Square" A number of Games await you here. Collect GP at Wonder Square and play some more!
Cloud chooses one member of the group to accompany him, and they set off to explore Gold Saucer. At Chocobo Square... A bunch of Shinra soldiers are gathered on the steps.

blockquote.p:
Aerith
What happened?

Tifa
What?

Red XIII
What happened?

Yuffie
What is it?

scene.p:
Cloud
Sh...!
Shinra soldiers... Even here...

Soldier
Attention! Dismissed!!
The soldiers disperse to different areas of the Gold Saucer, and after a moment Cloud heads up the stairs.

Lady at Entrance
Welcome to Chocobo Racing.

Man Betting
I... I lost...
Or, sometimes:
Yeahh! This is why I can't seem to quit.

Man
You can only buy up to 3 tickets. Think before you buy. For example, you could select half of the Chocobos and buy 3 boxes.

Cloud
- Boxes?
- Not interested

Man
A box is buying 3 combinations of 2 chocobos.
For example, if you select Chocobo 1, 3, and 5, you can purchase combinations, such as 1-3, 1-5, 3-5.
You can also play the limited wheel by selecting a Chocobo.

Cloud
- Limited wheel?
- Not interested

Man
Playing a 'Limited wheel' means you select a Chocobo and use it in all of your combinations.
For example, if you have Chocobo 1, then you buy 1-2, 1-3, 1-4.
No matter how you make your bet, you win some and you lose some. It all comes down to insight and luck.

Security (near Jockey Lounge)
I'm sorry, but this is for authorized personnel only.

Blond Man
We usually buy tickets for the B rank and C rank races, right?

Cloud
- Rank?
- Not interested

Blond Man
In other words, 'rank' means the Chocobo's 'strength'. A is highest and C's the lowest.
When you become a Free Chocobo jockey, you'll be able to buy A rank tickets.
Of course, the higher the rank, the better your item ticket. Hey, maybe I'll become a Chocobo jockey!?

Cloud
- How DO you become one?
- Not interested

Blond Man
You can become one if you own a Chocobo... and have some connections. But Chocobo's are pretty hard to catch and I don't have any connections.

Woman
Hey, what's that Chocobo on the odds sheet?

Redhead
That's how you can find out a Chocobo's condition and strengths.

Woman
Hmm, If you can tell which ones are the strongest, then it's easy...

Redhead
Well, not as easy as you think. It's not just a matter of the Chocobo's strength,
but it also depends on the jockey and the Chocobo's personality.
If these are bad, they may use too much stamina, and affect other things.

Lady at the Ticket Desk
Welcome. Would you like to buy some Chocobo tickets?

Cloud
- Yeah
- Ask how to buy
- Explain it to me
- Not interested

Lady at the Ticket Desk
Registration fees are 200 gil. Is that all right?

Cloud
- Yeahhh!
- No way!

Lady at the Ticket Desk
Which rank would you like to select?

Cloud
- C (1BET 1 0 0 gil)
- B (1BET 2 0 0 gil)
- Quit

Lady at the Ticket Desk
You are allowed a maximum of 3 bets on your Chocobo ticket.

Lady at the Ticket Desk
This Chocobo Race has Virtual devices on the course.
They show natural scenery during the race that really doesn't exist.
You pick which Chocobo will finish first and second here,
And then buy the appropriate tickets.
And if the ticket you purchased is a winner, you'll receive a ticket for an item that will be listed on the panel.
You can exchange your tickets for items or GP at the Exchange counter to the right of the entrance.
Nothing happens.
At Battle Square, there is a staff woman standing in front of the stairs.

Woman
I'm sorry, we're currently renovating. Please come again.
At Ghost Square, a zombie greets Cloud as he enters the hotel.

Zombie
Welcome. Thank you for coming to the Ghost Hotel.
Uuuuuuuuuuugh......
For reservations, please step up to the counter.
Uuuuuuuuuuugh......
Cloud steps up to the counter, and a man in a noose drops down with a scream.

Receptionist
It's our most popular employee, Mr. Hangman.

Mr. Hangman
Welcome!
It's 5 GP a night. Would you like to stay?

Cloud
- Yeah, all right
- No thanks

Flyer
[Turtle's Paradise]
No. 3
Forget the bad times with a nice drink...
Only thing missing in Gold Saucer is......
A pub with good drinks and a great atmosphere!
Stop in the "Turtle's Paradise"!
If Cloud attempts to go upstairs without paying...

Mr. Hangman
Sir... Please register at the counter!!
At Round Square...

Woman at Ticket Booth
Welcome. This attraction is 3 GP.
Shall you be riding this evening?

Cloud
- Yes, I shall
- No, I shan't

Woman at Ticket Booth
Would this be your first time riding with us?

Cloud
- Yes, it would
- No, it would not

Woman at Ticket Booth
You will be able to see all the different areas of Gold Saucer on this ride.
So please just sit back and enjoy a lovely view you won't see anywhere else.
This attraction can only ccommodate 2 passengers, so one of you please wait over there.

Woman at Ticket Booth
This attraction can only ccommodate 2 passengers, so one of you please wait over there.

Cloud
Who should I ride with...
Cloud selects a companion.

Woman at Ticket Booth
Enjoy the sights of Gold Saucer.
Cloud and his companion ride the gondola.

blockquote.p:
Aerith
Wow, how nice.
Oh! Look, Cloud.
It's so pretty.
Cloud!
Wow!

Tifa
Oh, how pretty.
Look, Cloud.
Oh, Cloud.
Look, look.
Look, there.

Yuffie
Wow!
Geez!!
Cloud!
Oh my gawd!
Geez!

p.span: If Cloud does not have enough GP to pay.

scene.p:
Woman at Ticket Booth
Um, I'm very sorry, but you do not have enough GP.
At Speed Square, a muscular man addresses Cloud when he arrives.

Man
Hey boy.

Cloud
Boy...

Man
How is it? You having fun?
Mmm, so, you ARE having fun. Well, good, good for you boy.

Cloud
My name's Cloud. And stop calling me boy.

Dio
Mmm? Me? I'm the owner of the Gold Saucer. The name's Dio.
Just call me 'Dio'.

Cloud
...... (Not even listening)

Dio
By the way, boy, do you know what a 'Black Materia' is?

Cloud
- I know what it is
- What is it?

Dio
Oh, so you do know.

Dio
Ha ha ha...... that, I say, that's a good one, boy! But it's not good to lie. You can't fool me.

Cloud
Why d'you ask me?

Dio
Well, a while back, a boy your age came in and asked me if I had a 'Black Materia.'
I thought you might know who he was, seein' as how you're both about the same age.

Cloud
Did he happen to have... a Black Cape...

Dio
Why yes, yes indeed. And a tattoo on his hand that said '1'.

Cloud
Where did he go!?

Dio
Ha ha ha, I have no idea.
Well then.
I say, stop by the Battle Arena if you like, boy.
You'll probably like it. Many of my collections are on display there.
Ha, ha ha.
He leaves.

Person
We have to be careful of these steps.
What...? A lot of things...

Redhead
First, I gotta memorize the order it comes out, and then guess on the attacks...... mumble, mumble......
Onward to the roller coaster. If Cloud tries to get on without buying a ticket...

Ticket Person
This way, Sir, to register.

Ticket Person
Is this your first time? First, listen to the explanation of the game over there.

Lady
Hear the rules for this attraction?

Cloud
- Yes
- Not interested

Lady
This attraction, Shooting Coaster is
While your ride's going ZOOM, you're going BANG BANG, and things are going PHEW PHEW and you destroy them with a big BOOM. Pretty simple, isn't it?
Oh, to shoot, hit the O Button. And, the Bar that's shown on the left side of the screen is the Power Meter.
When it's full, it'll go BROOOOOM and when it's empty, it'll only go BRM and become weak. So be careful.
Also, if you're in the Top 3 you'll get on the Wall of Fame.

Ticket Person
This attraction costs 10 GP.

Cloud
- Pay
- Changed my mind

p.span: If Cloud does not have enough GP to pay.

scene.p:
Ticket Person
......... You don't have enough GP

Ticket Person
Thank you.
Cloud and the others ride the coaster.

Wall of Fame Staffer
Your score is x points.
As a price, Received "Super Sweeper/Masamune Blade/1/35 soldier"!!
As a price, Received "Umbrella"!!
Sometimes after coming off the roller coaster, Cloud will walk to the side and hang his head.

Cloud
Ugh...

Wall of Fame Staffer
Would you like to see the Wall of Fame?

Cloud
- Yes
- Not interested
Cloud's current 3 high scores are displayed.

Wall of Fame Staffer
You'll receive a prize if you get more than 3000 Points. So good luck.
Stepping back into the hallway, Cloud may encounter a couple standing there.

Man
Hey, I finally got 5000 points.

Woman
Wow!! You're so wonderful!!

Man
Man, I finally got a prize...
The next time Cloud sees the couple...

Man
Hey, I got 5000 points again.

Woman
Wow!! You're so wonderful!!

Man
Well, I guess I'll go and get some more GP.
Sometimes a pair of children will appear running towards the coaster.

Little Girl
Eyyaaaaaa!

Little Boy
Yaaay----!!

Man
Come on now, no running.
At Event Square, the stands are empty except for some staff members and two couples sitting around.

Security
Sorry but there's no show now.

Staffer
We put on a really unusual show here. It's not on today, but come back again sometime and see it.

Couple
What's your problem? Can't you see we wanna be alone?

Couple 2
Geez, you're a real bummer. Why don't you just leave us alone?
At Wonder Square, Cloud and his companion are approached by a black cat toy riding a giant stuffed moogle.

Cait Sith
Hey you!! What're you lookin' so down for!?
How 'bout it? Want me to read your fortune!? A bright future! A happy future!
Oh, but don't hold it against me if it's not a great prediction!
Oh, so sorry! I'm a fortune telling machine. The name's...
Cait Sith.

Cloud
You can only read the future?

Cait Sith
You kidding!? I can find missing things, missing people, anything!

Cloud
Then can you tell me where a man named Sephiroth is?

Cait Sith
Sephiroth, right!?
Okay, here goes!!
He shakes about on his moogle, and it then hands Cloud a fortune.

Cloud
...Ordinary luck. It will be an active fortune.
Give into the good will of others, and something big'll happen after summer. ...wait... what's this?

Cait Sith
Huh? Let me try again.

Cloud
Be careful of forgetfulness. Your lucky color is... blue?
...Forget it.

Cait Sith
Wait, wait give me another chance!
Wait! Let me try it again!

Cloud
...What the!?

blockquote.p:
Aerith
What?

Tifa
What does it say?

Red XIII
Read it out loud, Cloud.

Yuffie
What is it! Tell us!

scene.p:
Cloud
What you pursue will be yours. But you will lose something dear.

Cait Sith
I don't know if it's good OR bad...
This's the first time I ever got something like THIS.
Then shall we?

blockquote.p:
Aerith
What are you talking about?

Tifa
Excuse me?

Red XIII
To where?

Yuffie
Huh?

scene.p:
Cait Sith
As a fortune teller, I can't help but think about this.
If I don't see what it leads to, I won't be able to relax. That's why I'm going with you!

blockquote.p:
Aerith
What are we going to do, Cloud?

Tifa
Is it all right, Cloud?

Red XIII
Cloud, it's all right with you?

Yuffie
He's weird! Cloud, don't let him come!

scene.p:
Cait Sith
I'm comin' with you no matter WHAT you say!

Cloud
H... hey!

Man in Overalls
They probably told you at the entrance, but most of the attractions at Gold Saucer only take 'GP'.
They don't sell GP. You can only get 'em from the Wonder Square games or at the Chocobo Races.

Chocobo Mascots
Let's get lotsa GP at Wonder Square and have some fun!

People Playing Wonder Catcher
All...... most......
Crap!
no cigar...
You sure do need a lot of money here.
Please...... don't...... talk to me...... right now.
I get so caught up in these......
Back there...

Guy on Motorcycle Game
Hyuuuuu, BAM, BAM, BAM...
Oh man, I just gotta shout.

Guy on Snowboard Game
Nope, I'm not quitting until I clear this!
I'm gonna be the wind again today!

Guy Near Submarine Game
Whew, I'm tired. Oh this? It seems to be out of order.

Guy Near Mog Game
...... Don't worry 'bout me. Go ahead and play.
Cloud plays Mog House.

Narration
This is Mog's house. It's in Mog Forest on Mt. Mog.
The beginning of another day in the life of a Mog.
This year, Mog is pipapopupo years old. ...that's 28 in human years. He's at that age when he should be looking for a mate.
But before Mog can become an adult, he first needs to learn how to fly.
Even though Mog trains hard everyday... He still can't seem to get off the ground...
Mog tries to fly and falls on his face.

Narration
Looks like he's still got a long way to go...
Here's where you come in. Help Mog learn how to fly by pushing O button and feeding him his favorite Kupo nut.
But don't overfeed him. He won't be able to fly if he's too fat.
Cloud feeds Mog Kupo nuts, and he hops up again.

Narration
Oh? It seems like Mog's decided to take another shot at it.

p.span: If Cloud fed him the wrong number of nuts...

scene.p: He falls flat on his face again.

Narration
Poor Mog. It looks like he'll have to wait some time for a mate.
Poor Mog, seems like he'll be alone for a while.

p.span: If Cloud fed him the right number of nuts...

scene.p: Mog takes off and makes a few circuits around the screen.

Narration
He did it! He's flying! Now, he's finally become a full-fledged Mog.
Mog lands and returns to his house, taking a bow before going inside.

Narration
Tired but relaxed, our little Mog turns out the lights early and goes to bed. Good night, and sweet dreams......
A pink moogle appears.

Narration
Oh?... What's this? Here comes a female Mog!
She approaches Mog's house and knocks. Mog comes out and chirps.

Narration
Seems he likes her too...
Now, will Mog be able to fly gracefully in front of her? Help him out with a few kupo nuts.
Cloud feeds Mog Kupo nuts, and he hops up again.

Narration
Oh? It seems like Mog's decided to take another shot at it.

p.span: If Cloud fed Mog the wrong number of nuts...

scene.p: He falls on his face again.

Narration
Unfortunately, he didn't make it. Poor Mog'll have to wait some time for a bride.
Poor Mog, seems like he'll be alone for a while.

p.span: If Cloud fed him the right number of nuts...

scene.p: Mog takes off and makes a few circuits around the screen.

Narration
He's flying!! Mog was able to do it!
She must have fallen for his graceful flying form.
The screen goes dark.
Sometime later...
Mog steps out of his house.

Narration
Looks like things are going good with his new Mog-friend. Time for a quiet date in the forest.
Her name is Mag. She is a good-natured Mog.
Mog and Mag leave the house and walk off screen.

Narration
Best of luck to the both of you, Mog and Mag. May you have lots and lots of healthy Mogs!
No fewer than 12 baby moogles exit the house. The last one trips and falls on his face. One of the others comes back for him and they run off.

Narration
Uh...no worries there, I guess...
~FIN~
The game ends.

Guy Near Mog Game
Hmm... I'm impressed... Thanks for showing me it.
Here, take this.
Received 30 GP!!

Fortune Telling Machine
1 fortune 50 gil

Cloud
- Try it
- Not interested

Fortune Telling Machine
Use caution in relationships
If Cloud tries to leave Gold Saucer via the Ropeway...

blockquote.p:
Aerith
Are you thinking of just us going back?

Tifa
Hey, Cloud, Are we going back without the others?

Red XIII
Are we leaving the others?

Yuffie
Cloud! Are we just going to leave the others?

scene.p: Returning to Battle Square, Cloud and the others arrive to find a Shinra soldier standing in front of the stairs.

Cloud
!!
The soldier collapses, and Cloud goes over to investigate.

Cloud
Mm!?
Dead......

blockquote.p:
Aerith
What!? Why?

Tifa
What!?

Red XIII
What the...

Yuffie
Wh... why?

scene.p: Cloud runs off up the stairs.

blockquote.p:
Aerith
Cloud!? Where are you going?

Tifa
Wa... wait Cloud!

Red XIII
Hey, Cloud!

Yuffie
Don't, don't just leave me!

scene.p: The others follow him up to the battle arena, where four more soldiers lie dead, and the staff members are slumped at their counters.

Cloud
Did Sephiroth do this!?
No... it's not him... They're all shot... Sephiroth would never use a gun...
One of the Gold Saucer staffers stirs.

Woman
Ugh, ugggh.
Cloud and the others run over to her.

Cloud
Hey, what happened!

Woman
Ugh... ugh... a man with a gun... on his arm......

blockquote.p:
Aerith
It can't be!?

Tifa
A gun on his arm!?

Red XIII
...did he!?

Yuffie
Wow, that's somethin!!

scene.p:
Security
Hold it right there! And stay quiet!!
Dio enters with two security guards.

Dio
Did you guys do this!?

Cloud
N... no, it wasn't us!

Dio (if you spoke earlier)
I must've been wrong...

Cait Sith
Hurry and run, it's gonna get ugly.
He runs for the arena.

Cloud
He...... hey!

Dio
Hold them!
Cloud follows Cait Sith into the arena.

Dio
That's as far as you go.

Cloud
Wait, listen to...

Cait Sith
Cloud...
Robots approach them from three sides, and Dio blocks the way back out... The scene changes to where Cloud is being held by one of the robots. Before him is a hatch labeled "Gateway to heaven."

Dio
One more to go.

Security
Yes

Cloud
Hey! Pay attention!!

Dio
There's no need to listen. Pay for your crime down below!!
Do it!

Security
Yes
The hatch opens, and the robot jumps in, carrying Cloud with it.
